scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,web -c green,blue "npm run dev -w apps/api" "npm run dev -w apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.preview: npm run build -w apps/web && npm run start -w apps/web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w apps/api && npm run typecheck -w apps/web
